name: Petting Your Pets
description:
‘Petting Your Pets’ is a game where the key interactions are going to be the player “petting” the mundane objects in their life, whether they be inanimate or living. The idea is that in exploring one’s own apartment and interacting with them pleasantly, they will be creating a feeling of affection towards that object because of its usefulness towards them.

Ultimately, this game is only in an Alpha Stage at the moment. It is a working progress between the four group members of Team Soul (which I am a part of <3).

The game will progress in the weeks to come in lieu with our quarter-long educational development cycle.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Explore the environment and interact with the objects until you feel there is nothing more to explore.

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow Keys for movement

Space Bar to jump

F to toggle full-screen mode

Escape Button to initiate pause menu
